about_the_game:
The Spectrolite Original Soundtrack composed by Andor Valentiny features the 5 iconic tracks you already know and love from the game, with an additional unused, unreleased bonus track 'Data Cloud Nine', which was originally written for an earlier version of Spectrolite.
This 27-minute long tracklist takes you back into the ruined world of the game and lets you relive the most memorable moments of your adventure.

Soundtrack files are available both in MP3 and uncompressed FLAC format.
detailed_description:

name: Spectrolite Soundtrack
short_description: The Original Soundtrack of Spectrolite composed by Andor Valentiny.
